items.title: Centre's environment panel clears Adani Power, NLC India and GMR Group's expansion plans for coal-fired power plants
items.description: The expert appraisal committee (EAC) of the environment ministry, however, rejected projects of NTPC Ltd, Jindal Power and JSW Energy.

items.title: Reset Before You Run: The quiet crisis in AI-driven marketing
items.description: AI hasn’t revolutionised marketing, it’s amplified our shortcuts. Without real customer understanding and first-party data, even the smartest tools deliver empty engagement. Connection, not automation, is the true competitive edge

items.title: Aadhar Housing to play a critical role in filling the demand gap
items.description: Long-term play, backed by strong operational foundation, sector tailwinds
